content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To help you schedule your plumbing service, may I have your name please?
Nice to meet you, John. Could you please provide your service address so I can check if you are within our service area?
I live at 124 Evergreen Road, Pine Hills.
Thank you, John. Let me quickly verify if 124 Evergreen Road, Pine Hills is in our service area.
I’m sorry John, but it appears your address is outside of our current service area. Unfortunately, we won’t be able to schedule a plumbing appointment at your location.
